description: Looking for a kale salad recipe with a twist? Try this healthier salad featuring this much-loved leafy green and an array of zingy citrus. It's so easy to make.
keywords: Fruit salad,Pescatarian,Orange,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Jun 2021,Lemon,Winter,Low sugar,Halal,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Kale,Autumn,Avocado
name: Citrus & Almond Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
0.5 bunch kale, stems removed, leaves roughly torn (see Tip)
2 small navel oranges, peeled, thinly sliced into rounds
1 ruby red grapefruit, peeled, thinly sliced into rounds
1 small red onion, thinly sliced into rounds
0.5 small avocado, deseeded, sliced into wedges
0.25 cup Woolworths dry roasted almonds, roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Combine oil and lemon juice in a large bowl. Add kale leaves and massage for 2 minutes or until tender.

Transfer kale to a platter, reserving any juice. Top with orange, grapefruit, onion and avocado. Combine yoghurt, dill and reserved juice in a small bowl. Drizzle yoghurt mixture over salad and season with pepper. Scatter over almonds and serve.
